mapper.select: SELECT ro.id,ro.roleKey,ro.roleDesc,re.resUrl FROM t_role ro LEFT JOIN t_role_resources rr ON ro.id = rr.roleId LEFT JOIN t_resources re ON rr.resourcesId = re.id
SELECT r.id,r.roleDesc,r.roleKey, (CASE WHEN (SELECT ur.roleId FROM t_user_role ur WHERE ur.userId= #{id} AND ur.roleId = r.id) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS selected FROM t_role r
